TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SplitterEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for and the events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者在移動時，就會發生事件控制項。The event occurs when the user is moving the control. 使用者完成移動後，就會發生事件控制項。The event occurs when the user finishes moving the control. 滑鼠指標位置的左上角的位置及類別會指定控制項。The class specifies the position of the mouse pointer and the position of the upper-left corner of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#548)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#548)]

MemberSignature.Value: public SplitterEventArgs (int x, int y, int splitX, int splitY);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 x, int32 y, int32 splitX, int32 splitY) cil managed
Public Sub New (x As Integer, y As Integer, splitX As Integer, splitY As Integer)
public: SplitterEventArgs(int x, int y, int splitX, int splitY);

param.name: x
param.span: 滑鼠指標的 X 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).

param.name: y
param.span: 滑鼠指標的 Y 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).

param.name: splitX
param.span: 左上角的 X 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the (in client coordinates).

param.name: splitY
param.span: 左上角的 Y 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the (in client coordinates).

summary.span: 使用指定的滑鼠指標和 控制項左上角的座標，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class with the specified coordinates of the mouse pointer and the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public int SplitX { get; set; }
.property instance int32 SplitX
Public Property SplitX As Integer
public: property int SplitX { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 左上角的 X 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the (in client coordinates).

value.span: 控制項左上角的 X 座標。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性連同屬性的這個類別，以決定的位置負責控制何時和引發事件。You can use this property along with the property of this class to determine the position of the control when the and events are raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#548)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#548)]

public: property int SplitY { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或是定 左上角的 Y 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the (in client coordinates).

value.span: 控制項左上角的 Y 座標。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性連同屬性的這個類別，以決定的位置負責控制何時和引發事件。You can use this property along with the property of this class to determine the position of the control when the and events are raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性連同這個類別，以判斷目前的滑鼠指標位置的屬性時和引發事件。You can use this property along with the property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the and events are raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
